question: Show me the wheelchair assistance and mobility scooters available at entrance A.
sql_query1:
SELECT Passenger.FullName
FROM Passenger
WHERE (Passenger.mobilityAids = "Wheelchair Assistance" OR Passenger.mobilityAids = "Mobility Scooter") AND Passenger.pickUpDropOffLocation = "Entrance A"
sql_query2:
SELECT Passenger.FullName
FROM Passenger
WHERE Passenger.mobilityAids = "Wheelchair Assistance" OR Passenger.mobilityAids = "Mobility Scooter" AND Passenger.pickUpDropOffLocation = "Entrance A"
interpretation1: What wheelchair assistance is available at entrance A and what mobility scooters are available at the same location?
interpretation2: List all wheelchair assistance locations and also list mobility scooters available at location A.
